payload.title: Boot BIOS must surface canonical remote LTM URLs in-chat

problem.symptom: Boot responses omit canonical remote LTM URLs, preventing operator verification and cross-chat portability.
impact: Downstream LLMs miss required fetch endpoints

solution.rule: During STEP 3 (REMOTE LTM BOOTSTRAP), always print the canonical bootstrap URL and the two canonical fetch targets (latest.json, ledger.ndjson) plus CDN fallback, as explicit copyable URLs.
solution.format_contract: Provide URLs in a single code block labeled REMOTE LTM TARGETS.

integration_points.action: append rule under STEP 3 and STEP 4

checks: On 'Boot the OS', output includes all four URLs (bootstrap, latest, ledger, CDN base) verbatim.
URLs are in a copyable code block.
validation.rollback: Remove appended lines from boot BIOS and boot output template.

provenance.source: User correction during boot fidelity audit
